DOC.brief_summary: Double-Blind, Randomized, Single-Dose Study to Evaluate the Atrial Selectivity and Safety of BMS-394136 in Subjects with Implanted Dual-Chamber Pacemakers or Defibrillators
DOC.brief_title: A Phase I Study to Assess the Electrophysiologic Effects of BMS-394136 on the Atrium and Ventricle in Patients With Dual-Chamber Pacemakers or Defibrillators
DOC.criteria: Patients with dualchamber pacemakers or defibrillators Recent acute ischemic events Recent atrial or ventricular arrhythmias Uncompensated heart failure Amiodarone use within last year Women of childbearing potential QTc <430 msec males QTc <450 msec females
DOC.keyword: Patients requiring dual-chamber pacemakers or defibrillators
